A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I wanted to give credit to this movie. I see it on release night like every star wars but I didn't feel any magic this time. I get bored very quickly over uninteresting plot and was very sad to even feel that way. Most of the movie feel like fillers and the only interesting part (Luke and Rey most of it) feel anticlimactic. The force awakens was not perfect but at least I still lived it and feel it every time I see it but not this one.
